title: Co-Teacher Feature Survey: Share Your Thoughts!
description: Help us improve co-teaching on Code.org by sharing your experiences with our new feature. The survey should take no more than 5 minutes to complete. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts and help us better support you and your co-instructors!

elements.name: rating_scale
elements.title: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the new ability to add co-teachers to your Code.org sections? (1=Not at all satisfied, 5=Extremely satisfied)

elements.name: situation_description
elements.title: Briefly describe what your co-teachers do in the context of Code.org. What are their responsibilities during class and before/after class?

elements.name: positives
elements.title: What do you like about the way we currently support co-teachers?

elements.name: negatives
elements.title: Have you encountered any challenges or issues while adding co-teachers to your section(s)? Please explain.

elements.name: other_suggestions
elements.title: Which additional tools or features would you like to see developed to better support co-teachers on Code.org?
